data.title: L'enfer d'Henri-Georges Clouzot [videorecording]
data.text:
General Note:

Based on an original idea by Serge Bromberg.

"A film written and directed using rushes from Henri-George Clouzot's Inferno."

Originally released as a motion picture in 2009.

Special features on DVD: Interview with director Serge Bromberg (9 min.).

Special features on Blu-ray: Interview with director Serge Bromberg (9 min.); Extensive image ... gallery featuring rare pictures from the original production' "They saw Inferno," a 57 min. documentary including unsseen footage. Read More

Summary, etc.:

One of the great, unfinished works in film ... history, Inferno, by Henri-Georges Clouzot was an audaciously experimental film with a virtually unlimited budget that was stopped only three weeks into production. Working closely with Clouzot's widow, Serge Bromberg and Ruxandra Medrea reconstruct Clouzot's original vision, filling and explaining the gaps with new interviews, re-enactments and Clouzot's own notes and storyboards, delivering an in-depth look at the masterpiece that might have been.
